inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black: Lith de Villain   Mauzaisse | below image in black: VELASQUEZ / d'apres son portrait par lui-meme | on sheet in pencil: 2-526
life_date: After Diego Rodriguez Velazquez, Painter, Spanish, 1599–1660; Villain, Lithographer, French, active 1815–1848; Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse, Printer, French, 1784–1844
title: Portrait of Velasquez
